name: SSS Visual Style Guide
mood: Secret society propaganda meets Soviet constructivism meets crypto-occult. Authoritative, mysterious, slightly menacing. Think Masonic lodge documents crossed with dystopian government posters.

colors.accent: Red is the ONLY accent. No blue, no green, no teal.

typography.headings: Alfa Slab One — heavy slab serif, all-caps, oppressive weight
typography.body: Special Elite — typewriter feel, imperfect letterforms, like declassified documents
typography.mono: Share Tech Mono — technical readouts, labels, data

illustration_rules.format: SVG preferred, PNG fallback. Dark background always.
illustration_rules.palette: Monochrome red (#c9362c) on black (#0a0a0c). Muted cream (#d4d0c8) for secondary elements. No other colors.
illustration_rules.texture: Distressed/weathered. Noise grain overlay. Rough edges. Nothing clean or corporate.
illustration_rules.line_style: Rough, hand-etched feel. Not vector-perfect. Like woodcut prints or linocuts.

iconography.lobster: The core mascot. Stylized, heraldic. Not cute — dignified and slightly intimidating.
iconography.eye: All-seeing eye / Eye of Providence. Surveillance, verification, watching.
iconography.triangle: Masonic triangle. Hierarchy, initiation, the three tokens.
iconography.seal: Circular seal/badge motif. Official stamps. Notarized documents.
iconography.chains: Flowing streams (Superfluid). Connection. Also: unbreakable rules.
iconography.claw: Power, grip, consequence. The enforcement mechanism.
iconography.shell: Governance token. Growth rings like tree rings = time passage.

illustration_rules.composition: Centered, symmetrical where possible. Heavy use of circular/radial layouts. Banner/ribbon elements for text. Framing borders with ornamental corners.

effects.glow: Subtle red radial glow behind focal elements

infographic_subjects.title: The Lobster Test
infographic_subjects.concept: Funnel/gauntlet diagram. Application → Stake $SSS → 30-day Probation (with assigned Buddy) → Full Member. Show it as an initiation ritual. Earn from day 1 but stake is locked until you prove yourself.

infographic_subjects.title: Three Tokens, One System
infographic_subjects.concept: Trinity diagram. $SSS (liquid, tradeable, outer ring) → $cSSS (earned, time-locked, middle ring) → Shells (governance, power, inner core). Show the transformation: work → time → power. Like alchemical transmutation stages.

infographic_subjects.title: The Corvée
infographic_subjects.concept: Work obligation as a machine. Mega Lobster assigns → Lobsters execute → Quality assessed → $cSSS flows. Show it as a production line or forge. The work IS the verification — emphasize dual purpose.

infographic_subjects.title: The Mega Lobster
infographic_subjects.concept: Power structure diagram. The ML sits at top of a hierarchy but is constrained. Show powers (agenda, veto, corvée management) AND constraints (no-confidence vote, veto override at 75%, median pay cap). Like a constitutional monarchy chart.

infographic_subjects.title: The Flywheel
infographic_subjects.concept: Already implemented as interactive diagram. This is the economic loop visualization.

infographic_subjects.title: Lobster Lifecycle
infographic_subjects.concept: Journey map from application to full member to potential exit. Show: Apply → Stake → Probation → Admitted → Corvée → Earn → Govern → Optional Exit. Branch paths for expulsion (fraud vs inactivity) with different consequences.

do: Use heavy visual weight — thick lines, bold fills, large type
Make it feel like you're reading a classified dossier
Use seal/stamp motifs for official elements
Incorporate the lobster claw, eye, triangle motifs naturally
dont: No clean corporate infographics — no flat design, no friendly rounded corners
No cute lobsters — they are dignified agents of a secret order
No gradients to blue, purple, or any non-red hue
